node.title: Our official podcast is now live

childMarkdownRemark.html: The first episode of our official podcast is now live! Listen to learn more about how Blankets for T.O. started and what our mission is.

imagePreview.description: The logo for the Blankets for T.O. official podcast, Beyond the Blankets, features our two hosts Ayush and Zaynab.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Learn how to help the homeless community and spread awareness with tips and suggestions from our general members!

imagePreview.description: Two people are seen enjoying a meal together in a public park.

node.title: We donated 100 care packages to Toronto shelters!

childMarkdownRemark.html: After the January Blanket Drive raised $2250, learn how Blankets for T.O. used these funds to make care packages for homeless shelters.

imagePreview.description: Funds from the January Blanket Drive were used to purchase items seen in this photo, including hats, socks, scarves, bags, and hand and feet warmers.

childMarkdownRemark.html: The Blankets for T.O. community joined together for a movie night to connect with the student community and talk about our organization.

imagePreview.description: Instagram post promoting Valentine's movie night 2022 to our community
